item.description: problem I have a matrix server called example.com, but it’s actually hosted on matrix.example.com. item.description: Intro - Avoiding bad patterns There are two uninspiring patterns I’ve observed with DNS management via Terraform (be it R53, Cloudflare etc): Resource blocks for each individual record.
